title: myTuner Classical Radios
summary: Listen to 60 classical masterpieces and 300 Online Radios!
developer: Appgeneration - Radio FM , AM and  FM Music, News
description: Classical music has been a powerful cultural force for centuries. It is even said that it can improve intelligence, humor, concentration levels and lower blood pressure, among many other things. With this app it will be easy for you to be inspired by any of these classical music genius while working and be at your best. With this app youâ€™ll be able to: - Have access to 60 of the most famous classical music songs to listen whenever you want; - Select and listen to more than 200 different classical radio stations, searchable by country;- Check the top selling classical music songs per country each day and listen to a preview, in order for you to know if you like it or not;- Add your favorite songs and radios to favorites for faster access;- Record a music playing on the radio in real time, so you can listen to it later;- Listen to music in the background;- Use AirPlay for a better sound experience;
descriptionHTML:
Classical music has been a powerful cultural force for centuries. It is even said that it can improve intelligence, humor, concentration levels and lower blood pressure, among many other things.

With this app it will be easy for you to be inspired by any of these classical music genius while working and be at your best.

With this app you’ll be able to:
- Have access to 60 of the most famous classical music songs to listen whenever you want;
- Select and listen to more than 200 different classical radio stations, searchable by country;
- Check the top selling classical music songs per country each day and listen to a preview, in order for you to know if you like it or not;
- Add your favorite songs and radios to favorites for faster access;
- Record a music playing on the radio in real time, so you can listen to it later;
- Listen to music in the background;
- Use AirPlay for a better sound experience;
comments: Pssh only snippets of the songs Then a ad says get all  the songs for 3 dollars and something after every little snippet of music. This app is a joke!!
